website_summaries.verdict: Huge pack of meat sticks that delivers a really low price per ounce.
pros: Offered in multiple meat options, including a turkey version, with a smoky flavor many people love
Product is made in the United States, so it has safe ingredients
All sticks are in one package that can be zipped shut
cons: Some packs have an odd taste with inconsistencies in manufacturing quality

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn't have mold thank goodness
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly greasy, yet taste fresh. These taste like any other cheap brand summer sausage does. They are decent and get the job done. They make a quick snack. As soon as I received them I split the package up into three separate piles. I vacuumed sealed 2 other piles and placed them in my freezer. I threw the 3rd one into a Ziploc bag and placed that one in the refrigerator. These do not have the added preservatives like Slim Jim, so they must be stored in a sealed container in a cold place. As other reviews have stated, they will mild over if not stored properly. The package is not resealable unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Galeano

customer_reviews.title: Meat-loving repeat customer gives it two thumb up
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straightforward, these are good. They're not overly processed to the point that it's mush in a skin, they have a little chew to them like a Slim Jim, but the taste is better than a Slim Jim, though similar For the quality of the meat, it's not all that expensive. I take 5 at a time for lunch at work. (I don't take an actual break, I eat while I'm working and it's usually full of interruptions.) So I get about a week's worth of lunches for $14, not bad. I'm on my third order of these, product has been exactly the same every time. I refrigerate after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Al S

customer_reviews.title: Some work required...not good "as is"
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought these off reviews and could not have been more dissatisfied. I found it hard to choke these down "as is" as a primary carnivore. However, after giving up on my last bag and feeling bad to even feed it to my dog, I decided to pop them in the air fryer after cutting them in half and I tried it myself "for the sake of my dog" and it was 1000% better! So, "as is", no thanks, but put in some baking time and GREAT FLAVOR! Probably too much fat in these, so to bake off the fat and wipe them down, makes the product more tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: So Yummy! [Beef]
customer_reviews.text: I discovered these at Sam's Club--they were handing out samples. Now I'm hooked, but Sam's does not sell them now. So, Amazon to the rescue! I love the savory goodness--salty/sour compared to a couple other brands I tried in an unsuccessful attempt to find a new favorite. These are very low carb, and great for Keto. My go-to snack on my extended workdays or when on errands or camping. I am definitely signing up for automatic delivery! I cut the sticks in half, and put them in a Glad container in my mini fridge at the office. Now I don't have to worry about the granola bars, donuts, and scones that are always available in the break room. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lena S

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed. I was hoping for better.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to these. But when they arrived the taste and texture were not up to par. Taste was not nearly as bad as texture. I actually ended up throwing a bunch away. I was expecting a solid somewhat fibrous stick, but when I bit into it was more of a mushy paste. If you're expecting anything like the Oberto Pepperoni Sticks or pretty much any Jerky or Sausage stick you buy at a checkout line in many stores, know it will not be like them.
customer_reviews.author: LMGknight

customer_reviews.title: Hit or Miss
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pack I've ordered. The first was great. I ate them over a period of a few weeks, and ordered another pack. The second arrived, and I could tell that something was off. They were seemingly different shades. Some looked withered and dry, while others looked fresh. I was hesitant to try one, so sat them down until I had a chance to really examine them. When I arrived home the same day and opened the pack, I noticed what appeared to be mold white spots on a few of the sticks. I threw the entire pack in the garbage, unwilling to pick through to find good/bad apples. Hesitant to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Zanaai K.

customer_reviews.title: Very greasy and bland tasting.
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews but feel compelled to do so about this product. Well packaged and arrived in good condition. However, each stick had a very greasy casing which I found not at all appealing. Biting into one revealed the stick to quite white inside which I'm sure indicated it was saturated with fat. The flavor was pretty bland too and left an aftertaste in my mouth. I really wanted to like them as visually they looked great but these were probably the worst beef sticks I ever had. I gave the package away.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Usually good packaging
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because they are really good and its not the manufactures fault. This is what I opened my box to see. This is exactly how it came. Someone needs to do a little bit better inspection on items! Amazon is replacing with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: A great product... I like the option of larger packages of these snack sticks.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great snack. I think they taste great and the option of buying a larger amount like this package is great. The package was sealed and arrived quickly and the product looked great. It also taste great as I have already eaten some and they were only delivered about an hour and a half ago. I would recommend this product to people that like beef and meat stick products. If you like these the larger package versions are the best option. Remember: put them in refrigerator after you open the package.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Passable, but something is a little off
customer_reviews.text: I've had these in smaller packs from stores, as well as this large pack from Amazon. The flavor and overall quality is inconsistent. Sometimes the 'skin' snaps nicely, other times it's chewy and the contents are too soft. Sometimes the flavor is nice, other times it just tastes weird. I think I've had enough bad batches now to stop buying these, even though they're the best value I've found. My new favorites are those made by Old Trapper, and though they cost more, the quality and flavor are consistently great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Comparison review
customer_reviews.text: These Wisconsin smoked sausages (Snack Sticks) in the tub were compared to these other Wisconsin beef sausages in the bag - they were similar yet different - the ones in the tub were tapered and sealed at the ends like proper linked sausages, they were more smokey than the bagged kind - these had straight cut ends, not tapered like links. These also had a more acrid flavor than the tub packed linked type. Obviously I prefer the tub of smokey link like beef sausages. But both were acceptable, kielbasa textured and flavoured sausages.
customer_reviews.author: petesuz

customer_reviews.title: Savor The Flavor
customer_reviews.text: For a beef snack stick these are pretty dang tasty! The flavor is one to savor - very bold and the texture is spot on. Since the flavor is on the bold side I had to eat it with an apple to tone it down. Love the packaging as it reseals nicely and an easy thing to grab when you get a snack attack. If it wasn't for the calories per stick I'd be chowing down on them. They packed a punch on flavor for me and the sheer ease of grabbing them for a snack made me a fan! Yep, I'd definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Duckie

customer_reviews.title: Standard Grocery Store Meat Stick
customer_reviews.text: Nothing amazing here. Squishy and has that fake, chemical, preservative taste. Very moist..like eating a stick of raw ground beef and not so much like a dry beef jerky texture. The contrast between the tough casing and soft meat isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: C.Tarbet

customer_reviews.title: To much fat is not the answer
customer_reviews.text: Cut above the rest, I bought a box of Jack links and this product, I eat both at the same time bite for bite and this one was by far way better. I understand that fat is ware the flavor comes from, they put it in cigarettes yea, they do. Anyway fat is what the mind loves but to much is not good for you, more of a balance is better for you. Jack links has way more fat then Old Wisconsin beef sausage and when you eat the two together it becomes apparent. So do your self a flavor.
customer_reviews.author: weed wacker

customer_reviews.title: Not to my taste but...
customer_reviews.text: I don't want a bash a product just because it is not to " my taste". Sooo... These are very fresh, I personally prefer more "dry" beef sticks. They have a good taste but slightly more acidic (than I personally prefer.) They are a good value. That being said, give them a try... if you don't care for them, don't get them again. Someone you know will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and flavorful
customer_reviews.text: If you like beef sausage sticks and are tired of the over processed ones on the store shelf, these are a great alternative. They must be refrigerated once opened, but they taste delicious and go very fast in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Etty

customer_reviews.title: Love These Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Finding a mid-day snack to take the place of chips and dip (typically loaded with lots of carbs) was a bit difficult for me. But these sticks met and exceeded my expectations. The smoked, salty flavor is great. Once opened I kept them in the fridge. I ate two a day so they only lasted 15 days. During that time they remained very fresh. I ordered a replacement pack yesterday and plan to keep these in my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, not dry.
customer_reviews.text: These are very tasty beef sticks. Not dry at all. Must be refrigerated. Best kept in an airtight container in fridge. Pricey, so an occasional treat, rather than a staple in my household.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Missy

customer_reviews.title: Coming from up North to a Southern state I really missed these!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for these snacks for sometime in the grocery store and never could find the one which not only was this size, but also had a good old fashioned flavor. These certainly fit that bill. Packed in a nice sealed package with a lot of item so that you could grab a few and enjoy when watching TV. A nice throw back to the good old days. You will not be disappointed at all. By the way, they store in the freezer well and that is if you don't gobble them all up first!
customer_reviews.author: Clark Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Soft beef sausage sticks
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for someone. I also sampled them and they were pretty good. these are the type where you have to refrigerate them after you open the package. Most of the time if you’re going to eat a SlimJim or beef jerky it’s like room temperature. They’re quite soft and they have a bit of a snap when you bite into them and they’re not too spicy or sweet. I want to try all the flavors by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gumball Bunny

customer_reviews.title: skin is very tough but the flavor is very good.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the flavor of this product. It was a little greasy. The biggest problem was the casing. You better have good teeth to chew through it. Otherwise, this is my favorite beef stick ever if you only cared about flavor/taste. The best thing for me was that it was mild. So many things today have so much pepper and spice that I can't eat it. The beef has the least pepper or hot spice. Thank you for that.
customer_reviews.author: puzzle plus

customer_reviews.title: Great snack, delicious, family wants more!!
customer_reviews.text: Tasty!! My husband Absolute loves them. He likens the flavor to summer sausage (beef) although his favorite summer sausage is turkey.. he ate these up quick! Then my brother in law went out and bought 4 packages!! They are delicious. Even my little ones liked them!! Nice protein packed snack and not a bad price.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, and really staves off hunger in the afternoon
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, and really staves off hunger in the afternoon. Bought these on a whim when looking for a meat/jerky/sausage snack. Man — what a good choice! Smoky and savory flavor — somewhat reminiscent of the old Hillshire Farms smoked sausage — that really hits the spot when you’re dragging in the afternoon. Good sized package kept well in the fridge (but only for a while because the kids kept stealing them!)
customer_reviews.author: J ALLAN FEHERVARI

customer_reviews.title: Actually made out of real meat!
customer_reviews.text: These sausage snack sticks hit the right note for me: Wisconsin summer sausage. Most on the market lean on the heavy spices like pepperoni, or garlicy like salami. Nothing wrong with that, but we all have preferences. The "jerky" versions found at the checkout line have lots and lots of chewiness, but short on meat flavor. Then there is the current fad, "uncured" pepperoni. (I thought they had found a cure for that?) These seem to have the fewest ingredients or additives. Not cheap in the big bag, but if you only eat a couple at a time, the bag will last for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Barry McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: very fatty beef sticks
customer_reviews.text: If you want a moist, fatty beef stick, these are what you're looking for. The taste is alright, but masked by the excessive fat content and they don't have any real snap to them. These are fatty enough they must stay refrigerated and even when refrigerated, they feel like they're caked in fat as they get fatty grease all over your fingers. Unfortunately, these win out on price vs the Tillamook brand beef sticks that I'd otherwise recommend over these.
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: VERY HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: These are the only beef sticks we will ever buy from now on. They are excellent and the package does reseal, I noticed one person commented that it did not resell but it does. It does say refrigerate after opening and they keep a long time. Taste is excellent and did not change from the first stick to the last stick in the package. As somebody else said these are What Slim Jims wish they were, these are excellent and the price could not be better for the quality of your getting.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schut

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, nice mild flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I like these. I occasionally want a snack at night that contains meat and I thought I would try these. I don't really like Slim Jim's so I was not sure I would like these. Well, they are better than a Slim Jim and not as oily and a bit milder in taste, reminds me a bit of Hickory Farms Sumer Sausage. If I eat 1 Slim Jim I don't want any more for a year, I ate 4 of these as soon as I opened them. Only bad thing is they have lots of salt.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Morris

customer_reviews.title: Package redesign.....
customer_reviews.text: Opened the pack up. Was only able to eat a few so I repacked these into ziplock bags. Less than 4 days later they were moldy inside the bags. I guess my 'repacking' job was insufficient but I have never had anything else moldy in just a couple of days....anyways. They are OK snacks just only able to eat a few sticks before I had to throw them all out. Package needs to be redesigned to allow for reclosing if they can't be repacked.
customer_reviews.author: fred_flintstone

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: In this case you get what you pay for cheap price equals cheap fatty and gross tasting beef jerky. Honestly it taste like a fatty cold cheap hotdog you would eat raw. the packing sucked also it was sealed but you could see the air in it before you poped the seal. I am truly disapointed
customer_reviews.author: mykey

customer_reviews.title: Molded
customer_reviews.text: This was molded when I received it and it wasn't airlocked. It was never open.
customer_reviews.author: Real Dangerr

customer_reviews.title: Got moldy the next day
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these hoping to serve them at a party. The were unopened and in my refrigerator. I needed to move a few things around and when I moved them I saw gray color on some of the sticks. I took them out of the package and most of them were growing mold. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Bronte1068

customer_reviews.title: Good keto snack
customer_reviews.text: These beef sticks are a good snack if you eat a low-carb or keto diet. I refrigerated mine, and portioned them out to take just a couple to work each day as a snack to keep some protein and fat in my system so I wouldn't be tempted to eat sugary junk food that is so often present in the place where I work. These beef sticks are certainly better than Slim Jims and I don't find them to be "mushy" as others have said. I also don't think they're overly salty, but hey, everyone's sense of taste is different. I would like for these to have a bit more "zing" flavor-wise, but they're really not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice M. Christian

customer_reviews.title: ) It's about the perfect ratio for that
customer_reviews.text: These got me through a lot of tough times when I was limited to under 10-15 carbs/day and on the strictest stage of the Modified Atkins/Ketogenic Diet (for epilepsy management.) It's about the perfect ratio for that. Keep in mind that they are VERY salty - which can be a good thing as low-carb diets sometimes deplete your body of salt you would otherwise get from carb-rich foods. They were definitely lifesavers for me a few times though and don't taste horrific; hooray!
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These are greasy and do not have a real good texture. The flavor is so-so. I won't order again, but I figured I'd try them first and give an honest opinion. Amazon sells other brands that are much better, but they are more expensive. In the future I will opt for the quality and not the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: J Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Very Thick Casing, maybe a bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many Old Wisconsin snack sticks by now. I had Pepperoni, Turkey, Honey Turkey, and Habanero, and they are all good, but the original beef one has the thickest casing I ever had. It’s as if I am chewing on paper that wrapped with the meat. It's not a pleasant texture to eat, I have to chop it and pan-frying it to get rid of the paper-like texture.
customer_reviews.author: TD凉

customer_reviews.title: Weirdly Wet, Not Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I felt like I ate a beef flavored hose; it was so freakishly moist and not in a good way. I'm thinking they're pumping salt water into them to avoid adding actual ingredients to it? Besides the off putting texture, the flavor feels fake and is about the same quality as a gas station slim jim. I wish I could return this and get my money back!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lorah_love

customer_reviews.title: I'm No Fan
customer_reviews.text: These sticks are Not Good. Taste like Smoked Salt and left me with a Very Dry Mouth all night.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas.H.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, great value
customer_reviews.text: I dip them in cream cheese and eat them as a keto/adkins type snack. I bought two pounds for 28 bucks when normally I'm buying 3oz for 4-6 dollars. Great taste, look great, and great value. What more can I ask for.... except more! :>)
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Colombani

customer_reviews.title: Good value and taste.
customer_reviews.text: Very good taste. They do mold faster if you don’t put them in the refrigerator. Also, keep them in an airtight container. Easy snack that is very healthy and taste great with little greasy film left in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: BLESSED

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Love these snack sticks. I eat one or two a day. Their high sodium so I can't eat as many as I would like. I tried them because I wanted something similar to a Slim Jim with less salt. These were a great choice. I still like my slim Jims but these are better and less sodium in my opinion. The resealable bag works nicely. If your looking for some kind of beef snack I would say try this first. Cheap and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Tasty beef snacks an excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Lots of negative reviews are on Amazon regarding this product. I'd like to say that I'm totally pleased with them. The flavor is excellent, the packaging is durable and air-tight, and they are very economical when compared with buying these types of snacks piecemeal at the corner convenience store. I didn't find any evidence of spoilage or mold (a common complaint), and I would buy these again. Keep up the good work, Old WIsconsin
customer_reviews.author: J. Blair

customer_reviews.title: really good beef sticks
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tasting beef sticks out there, in my opinion. I like these for when I need a snack, but don’t want something with carbs or sugars. It won’t make you sleepy! Also, if you use the subscribe and save store, you can order these and save, as of this writing.
customer_reviews.author: Marta SolitaireTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, cheap and low/no carb/sugar
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to find no/low carb snacks. Most meat snacks have sugar. Got tired of making my own jerky and tried these. Tried both beef and turkey, not sure which i like better they are close. Taste like meatier slim jims with a bit less spices. Just ordered another pack. Have not seen anything else this inexpensive. Wish they offered them individually wrapped for on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Vanguard 77

customer_reviews.title: Mushy meat paste!
customer_reviews.text: When I got these I immediately open them to try them. I found the meat stick to really mushy insidesmooth. Mostly fat, protein snoothy. Putting them in the fridge helped a little. Turkey ones are really good thpugh
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The flavor, and value are amazing. (It’s also great for keto if you’re into that) My one “beef” is that it’s a huge package and is supposed to be consumed within 7 days of being opened. Could you please please please separate the sticks into smaller packages within the large package so they can last longer? That would be amazing. Maybe 7 per sub packet?
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R

customer_reviews.title: Best meat stick especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: I take these with my lunch everyday and look forward to them, always fresh and they have a great flavor. Anyone who likes a meat stick this is one of the best out there and in my opinion the best for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Denton Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Handy snack
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed these beef snacks. In fact, we just reordered a couple of days ago, immediately after eating the last one in our package. Good flavor, reasonable price, and something which everyone in our family likes.
customer_reviews.author: Carnation CCB

customer_reviews.title: Not the "Old Wisconsin" I used to know
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small pack for my bail out bag in my car. I bought another for the house and work. They're not good. I don't know what happened to this brand, but I remember them being much better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Kosteck

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a snack not a salt lick
customer_reviews.text: it would have been 5 stars if there were just 1/2 the salt (or less). I dip a stick in sour cream or spread it with cream cheese to counteract the salt, but the last taste, And the long lasting after taste, is still just Salt. Too bad. it's a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Thought full

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: Meat has some kind of skin, film over it and it is not edible, and is very difficult to remove. Meat itself is flavorless, tasteless . Do not recommend and ended up throwing most of it out in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: meB

customer_reviews.title: Great Wisconsin Carnivore product
customer_reviews.text: Completely enjoying the Old Wisconsin Sausage Beef Sticks. They are sugar and additive free making them satisfactory for Carnivore diet participants. AND they are made in Wisconsin! They are price competitive with CHOMPS
customer_reviews.author: Debbie  Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good taste, stays fresh
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste, price, fast delivery, stays fresh in packaging provided (must refrigerate after opening). Even my wife, who is not a big jerky or beef stick lover - likes these Old Wisconsin beef sticks
customer_reviews.author: HD.

customer_reviews.title: If you like salty then grab em
customer_reviews.text: These sticks are delicious. They are definitely salty so if you don't like that then they are not for you. If you like salty then grab em. They are similar to some "big" brands but I think their texture is better. They are more like eating real meat than some of the others. They come with a resealable bag now with is great.
customer_reviews.author: Earth2Frog

customer_reviews.title: Great snack to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Great snack to have on hand. My sons (2 & 4) also like them, and I feel it's a good quick snack for them that has some protein and "staying power". The only problem is that with the larger quantity and re-sealable package...my husband grabs & eats 3 at a time so we go through them a bit more quickly :-D.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper M

customer_reviews.title: These beef sticks are good for a quick snack
customer_reviews.text: These beef sticks are good for a quick snack. I purchased these over a month ago and placed them in the refrigerator upon opening the package. While the ones that have been refrigerated are still very good, I have noticed the beef sticks start to turn a grayish color if they are not kept refrigerated. I had stuck a few in my backpack and left them there for a couple days--they did not start to mold, just turned a different color. Be sure to keep these refrigerated when you receive them!
customer_reviews.author: laweaver001

customer_reviews.title: I think I'm addicted!
customer_reviews.text: So good, so yummy, perfect mid day snack. I always refrigerate after opened and have never had a issue with freshness. I have tried the beef and the turkey and love them both. Try them!
customer_reviews.author: shari b.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Yummmm!!! Excellent to cut into small pieces for training dogs, perfect cut up and added to eggs, perfect for just grabbing one and eating on the go! So many ways to eat these little gems!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, has to be refrigerated
customer_reviews.text: While my kids tease me and say it looks like a dog treat, they changed their tune after trying it. Good stuff, just wish it didn’t have to be refrigerated after opening. That was a deal breaker for me since I want it while out on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the heck out of these meat snacks! They helped sustain me when hiking 23 miles over the course of two days. Lots of flavor and protein. I'll definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: INCONSISTENT TASTE, STALE
customer_reviews.text: Lacks flavor. Though expires 2021, only first few tasted OK. Tastes stale even by 2nd day in fridge In addition, bad ingredients, too much SODIUM, NITRITE
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: goodf, but has hard bits
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, but has hard chunks in about every other stick. Be careful not to break teeth
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hollister

customer_reviews.title: Great snacks
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best sasuage snacks I have ever bought If you are on a keto diet they are wonderful snacks I will definitely continue to buy and recommend to all my friends
customer_reviews.author: Fayeh15

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try but didn't work out.
customer_reviews.text: Mercy! The beef used in the sticks I got was a tough old bovine. If you want to chew on a cud, this is the snack to buy. The more you chew the bigger and denser it gets. Felt like I was 6 years old chewing on a bite of stringy roast beef. Taste was OK, price was good, plenty of sticks in package, but will throw most of it out. At age 73 figure I won't live long enough to finish the package. Will try another brand next time I buy.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in taste and price
customer_reviews.text: I love these beef sticks, they are excellent especially for the price. I enjoy them refrigerated for a firmer texture. My one wish is for them to remove the less desirable dextrose, corn syrup solids and nitrites. Would be great to have a pure carnivore product if able, but I am sure that is very difficult in good science. I will continue to enjoy these!
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: These were very strange. You bit into them and a liquid substance came out of the middle and it tasted and felt like grease. It left you mouth feeling like you just ingested a teaspoon of oil. Nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Brn2bme

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Big bag full,great treat
customer_reviews.text: The perfect snack pack,,beefy flavor,,good price,perfect road trip snacks at an affordable bulk price ,not individually packaged but that's what zip baggies are for
customer_reviews.author: Debbie mac

customer_reviews.title: Nasty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I was getting a good value for the price and after tasting them they went right in the trash! There's taste nasty it's simple. Spend a little more get a better product
customer_reviews.author: troy

customer_reviews.title: Keto Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh tasting great price! Kept stored in refrigerator because once opened and transferred into ziploc bag they molded pretty quick. Is a great keto friendly snack!
customer_reviews.author: L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a good snack on my keto diet and a good alternative for my daughter who eats too much junk. They taste great too. They aren’t too spicy either.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: These were the very hard to chew.
customer_reviews.text: VERY TOUGH, I eat a lot of beef sticks, I looked at these on Amazon thought sound good, was I surprized these are the worst I ever eaten. I am 89 yrs. old. Tough to chew, very thin, very dry and not very flavorful. George
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Once my favorite, had to cancel.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering this product for nearly a year. It has been a favorite around my house. The last package I received had several moldy sticks. I will no longer purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: JARS

customer_reviews.title: Best Beef Sticks EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had a hard time finding these in KY. Took a chance Amazon would have them. Sure enough. I have ordered twice. I just love these as a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka Vigus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting and best priced meat/sausage sticks in my opinion. Compared to other products, definitely more for the money. As always, shipped in quick fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Brumagin

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these sausage snack sticks twice now. They're really good. On a hectic morning, just pop 4 sticks into a snack bag; pair them up with a couple sticks of cheese and you're good to go until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Ikky-san

customer_reviews.title: Great quick snack
customer_reviews.text: I treat myself to a couple of beef sticks for a fast convenient snack ... these are chewy without being soft and are not spiced at all ...
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nothing old about Old Wisconsin Snack Sticks.
customer_reviews.text: While these aren't the best quality beef sticks you'll ever find they are great for the money. These keep for an incredibly long time either refrigerated or warm. This makes them a good candidate for road trips or hunting trips in the cooler as a snack. The smell is strong though which isn't abnormal so bring a tooth brush for your hot date afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Okay if refrigerated.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's because I'm from Alaska and I'm used to having good game/fresh meat products directly from good sources, but these were very soft inside. I like them only if they are refrigerated, and that is just because the larger percentage of fat isn't so soft. Glad I didn't give them as a gift. Tubes of flavored squish. Glad I refrigerated them so that I could eat them without wasting.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Rohler

customer_reviews.title: A Best Buy For Taste and Quanity
customer_reviews.text: Good not great, large amount of sticks, and good price compared to other offerings. I wish they were cured or smoked longer, a little soft for my taste. But better tasting than other products I've tasted! I tried putting a couple in a paper bag to dry them out more, did not help very much.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product (at least mine was)
customer_reviews.text: Although very happy about how quickly they arrived. Was extremely disappointed that after only getting to eat a handful over last few days, the product went bad and has to be thrown away. They were kept in the refrigerator as specified after opening. Will never purchase again, a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great(most of the time)
customer_reviews.text: Order these fairly regularly and generally love them but the quality is all over the place. Fresh and delicious to moldy to jerky. They do replace the bad ones without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flavor
customer_reviews.text: Wisconsin meats and cheeses are the best. These beef sticks are slightly peppery and full of flavor without being greasy. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife seal of approval
customer_reviews.text: My wife & I devoured it. Not individually packaged (which was fine; just wanted to mention it in case someone else thought they would be). Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: TaGenuis

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. He used to be able to buy a 2 and a half pound bag at Kroger's but ever since this Keto craze started the company, unfortunately, did away with that size and only offers 14oz. packs now. The smaller the size means the company makes more money.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keep in a cool place though
customer_reviews.text: So addictive. Definitely keep in a cool place though. I went away for the weekend and it got above 85o in my house and the remains of the pack went rancid.
customer_reviews.author: crs

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these sticks are some of the best you can get. As someone who is gluten free, it is hard for me to find good snacks and these jerky sticks are excellent for a quick bite to eat. Packing is excellent and doesn't shred, flavor is good and they have a decent shelf life. 5/5 for value.
customer_reviews.author: Josh A.

customer_reviews.title: A fulfillment snack any time of day, YUM!
customer_reviews.text: I was sad when I ate them all, lol. I hope to buy again real soon. Its a little pricey but its worth it, I guess. Great for snacks, very beefy & tasteful & a fulfillment snack at any time of day.
customer_reviews.author: Nickibabylove71

customer_reviews.title: Too much fat to be enjoyed.  Turned out to be expensive dog treats.
customer_reviews.text: Cant say these were very good. Very greasy. Half filled with white fat. Tried rendering out some of the fat but still not great. Wound up using them for dog treats
customer_reviews.author: Just added water

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they are decent. I bought them for kiddos and they like them just fine. As an adult I'm not really a fan. They don't have much flavor and coat the inside of your mouth with fat. I'm going to find another brand to keep at the house so I can enjoy them too, but I'll definitely grab some to have at the kids parties and whatnot. Packaging is fine, just make sure to refrigerate them after opening.
customer_reviews.author: That One Guy...

customer_reviews.title: Its like a bad slim Jim
customer_reviews.text: tastes just like a slim Jim but the textures is worse and sort of mushy and gross. Low quality meat, rare chance of a sandy bit. The turkey ones are okay
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great snack or light meal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and are as described! A tasty beef stick pack that is sealed airtight and is more affordable than our local store! I can eat 1-2 of these with 1-2 cheese sticks and that’s a 400 calorie, fat and protein full meal. My boyfriend dips them in spinach artichoke dip!
customer_reviews.author: Jana H

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I work at a party store in Michigan and for some reason the company we go through for snack sticks discontinued these. These are soooooo good and I was so happy to find them here. Less greasy than slim jims and have a better flavor.
customer_reviews.author: kristiin

customer_reviews.title: Soo good and not bad of a price
customer_reviews.text: Love these for the cost. I have a husband and two growing boys they really like these at a snack
customer_reviews.author: Pixel Chick

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I’m just getting the review request. I order this 2 years ago. I love these. The seal was compromised (pin hole) when I received them. I ordered 3 or 4 the vacuum seal was not vacuumed on 1 package. But still good I ate them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived hot and greasy
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't care for this one, nobody at the office did either. They were hot & greasy when they arrived. Maybe it damaged the quality in shipping. Won't buy again. I love the other flavors except this one, and they are GF.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: These are ok
customer_reviews.text: They’re not anything special. An ok snack but I don’t find myself really craving them or digging their flavor. Kind of bland in terms of meat sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Easy go to snack
customer_reviews.text: This is so hard to find in the grocery store but such a tasty snack at any point in the day.
customer_reviews.author: ash4shash

customer_reviews.title: Beef < Turkey
customer_reviews.text: Usually get the turkey, but gave the beef a whirl. Definitely not as good...surprisingly. Texture was very mushy and flavor was relatively mild. Not horrible, but the turkey version is what I'll be ordering from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Yanx21

customer_reviews.title: Turkey good, beef bad.
customer_reviews.text: I useualy get the turkey and tried the beef thus time. It tasted off, almost a sour taste.
customer_reviews.author: cheapet

customer_reviews.title: Great value and tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I love these beef sticks. This is best deal I could find. I like the resealable packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: very chewy.
customer_reviews.text: These things are very chewy. The turkey version is ways better. if you microwave them, they become chewable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hat

product_meta.title: Old Wisconsin Beef Sausage Snack Sticks, Naturally Smoked, Ready to Eat, High Protein, Low Carb, Keto, Gluten Free, 26 Ounce Resealable Package
product_meta.description: At Old Wisconsin, we craft the finest sausages because we pick only the most premium cuts of beef, pork and turkey. Next we use the perfect recipe of spices passed down by generations of sausage makers. These spices complement our meats, ensuring that they enhance the natural flavors while never overpowering them. We use no binders, fillers or extenders—just enormous care to ensure that our sausages are always mouthwateringly delicious. We hand craft our meats into a variety of shapes and sizes before we begin the smoking process. We smoke all of our meats slowly over real hardwood fires in our traditional pit style smokehouse to ensure natural flavor. We leave them hanging for as long as it takes until we're satisfied with the flavor. After we smoke our meats, we pack them immediately to seal in the freshness and flavor. Quality control procedures are in place at every step of the process, and goods are stored under optimal temperatures to maintain freshness and quality. But our products rarely sit around. We ship to retailers all across the country, allowing everyone to experience the true taste of Wisconsin.
feature_bullets: Contains one (1) 26 oz. resealable package of beef sausage snack sticks
Beef sausage snack sticks are a delicious ready-to-eat paleo alternative to beef jerky and other dried meat snacks
We handcraft our sausage snacks with only the most premium cuts of meat, with no binders, fillers, or extenders
Our beef snack sticks are carefully spiced and smoked to enhance the delicious, natural flavor of our high-quality beef
These appetizing snack sticks contain no MSG and are the ultimate blend of convenience and flavor, perfect for men, women, and kids on-the-go looking to give their taste buds a healthy treat

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
